name: Monster Paint Store
description:
Monster Paint Store is a game about mixing paint and matching monsters!  The cute monsters change their color by combining with other monsters just like mixing paint. Hatch monster eggs, combine colors, discover formulas and fulfill your customers orders!

How to play:

  • Drag the monster eggs onto the nests. If a monster egg lands on another egg or monster, they might combine and transform into another monster based on their colors! As you run your little shop, you will discover more monsters and formulas!
  • Match monsters by putting three of the same kind next to each other. But be careful of the black monsters! They don't mix or match with anything, so they will only take up your precious hatching space, unless you bomb them!
  • How do you bomb them, you say? Matching monsters of different colors can give you a rainbow bomb that will clear out a monster and all its neighbors.
  • Fulfill your costumers' orders by matching the monsters they want. Your customers use the monster paint for, well, painting! They might bring you gifts if you give them what they want!
  • Sometimes a monster doesn't want to combine with an egg because they are too similar. Can you figure out the rules on your own?
